Love Quotes.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Love Quotes.author: Aristotle

Love Quotes.text: Where there is love there is life.
Love Quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Love Quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
Love Quotes.author: William Shakespeare

Life Quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Life Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Life Quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Life Quotes.author: John Lennon

Life Quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Life Quotes.author: Mae West

Motivational Quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.text: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Motivational Quotes.author: Sam Levenson

Motivational Quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Motivational Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Humor Quotes.text: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
Humor Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

Humor Quotes.text: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
Humor Quotes.author: A. A. Milne

Humor Quotes.text: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
Humor Quotes.author: Jim Carrey
